text: == Events == * The first modern Olympic Games takes place in Athens. * Alden J. Blethen buys The Seattle Times. * On January 4, Utah became a state in the United States. == Births == * February 9 – Alberto Vargas – Pin-up artist * May 30 - Howard Hawks, American director (d. 1977) * August 27 – Miyazawa Kenji Japanese poet, writer of children's literature * September 21- Walter Breuning, among the oldest people
